segments.text: Hello ? This is Steven . I'd like to speak to Mr . Brown , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm afraid he is not in at the moment .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then what time do you think he will be in ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I suppose he won't come back until 6 p . m . By the way , do you want to call later , or would you like to leave a message ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'd like to leave a message . Please ask him to give me a call as soon as he returns . He has my number .
segments.speaker: S1
